messages.message: I've checked out release-24.04.0-enterprise on my crafting sandbox built off ib-dev-backend. When I try `cs restart api-server` I get the following error: `No matching run for "api-server" of DAEMON`. Any thoughts on what I can do to fix this?
Try just cd-ing into the api-server and run it as you normally would with make build-docker run-docker

tried doing this (on both master and release-24.04.0-enterprise to confirm its not a branch issue) and now I get a 502 bad gateway on https://https--debug-fs-2-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/admin/dummy/fs/Instabase%20Drive/. I think we need to restart the services with the `cs` command.
got around this by building `api-server` on `24.04.0-enterprise` , then checking out to `master` to run `cs restart api-server`
